gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 106, Magic 104
gameRecap.excerpt: Dejounte Murray knocked down a fadeaway jumper with time expiring to lift the Hawks over the Magic, 106-104. Murray recorded a team-high 26 points (10 in the 4th quarter), along with five rebounds and five assists for the Hawks, while Trae Young added 18 points and 12 assists in the victory. Paolo Banchero tallied 26 points, four rebounds and four assists for the Magic in the losing effort. The Hawks have won back-to-back games as they improve to 17-23 on the season, while the Magic fall to 22-19.
